scripts.build:noveldeepwes: python3 index.py profiles/freeze.yaml noveldeepwes 'Novel Omics Deep-WES'
scripts.build:novellrwgs: python3 index.py profiles/freeze.yaml novellrwgs 'Novel Omics LR-WGS'
scripts.build:novelsrwgs: python3 index.py profiles/freeze.yaml novelsrwgs 'Novel Omics SR-WGS'
scripts.build:novelrnaseq: python3 index.py profiles/freeze.yaml novelrnaseq 'Novel Omics RNAseq'
scripts.build:novelwgs: python3 index.py profiles/freeze.yaml novelwgs 'Novel Omics WGS'
scripts.build:freezes: yarn build:freeze1 && yarn build:freeze2 && yarn build:freeze3
scripts.build:novelomics: yarn build:noveldeepwes && yarn build:novellrwgs && yarn build:novelsrwgs && yarn build:novelrnaseq && yarn build:novelwgs
scripts.import:freezes: yarn import:freeze1 && yarn import:freeze2 && yarn import:freeze3
scripts.import:novelomics: yarn import:noveldeepwes && yarn import:novellrwgs && yarn import:novelsrwgs && yarn import:novelrnaseq && yarn import:novelwgs
